sqlMap.select: SELECT NO, SUB_NO, NAME, DEB_MONEY, CRE_MONEY, DEPTH, DEPTH_FULLNO FROM (SELECT SUB, SUM(DEB_MONEY) DEB_MONEY, SUM(CRE_MONEY) CRE_MONEY FROM (SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, MONEY DEB_MONEY, 0 CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, 0 DEB_MONEY, MONEY CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, MONEY DEB_MONEY, 0 CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, 0 DEB_MONEY, MONEY CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, MONEY DEB_MONEY, 0 CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, 0 DEB_MONEY, MONEY CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, MONEY DEB_MONEY, 0 CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, 0 DEB_MONEY, MONEY CRE_MONEY, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_INC_CHIT) WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(DEAL_DATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate# GROUP BY SUB) CHIT INNER JOIN (SELECT NO, SUB_NO, NAME, SUBSEC, DEPTH, LTRIM (SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH (NO, ','), ',') AS DEPTH_FULLNO FROM SUB START WITH SUB_NO = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR NO=SUB_NO) SUB ON CHIT.SUB = SUB.NO

SELECT A.SUB_NO NO, B.NAME, B.DEPTH, B.SUB_NO FROM (SELECT SUB_NO FROM (SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(DEPTH_FULLNO, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS SUB_NO FROM (SELECT NO, DEPTH_FULLNO FROM (SELECT SUB FROM (SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_INC_CHIT) WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(DEAL_DATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate# GROUP BY SUB) CHIT INNER JOIN (SELECT NO, SUB_NO, LTRIM (SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH (NO, ','), ',') AS DEPTH_FULLNO FROM SUB START WITH SUB_NO = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR NO=SUB_NO) SUB ON CHIT.SUB = SUB.NO) CONNECT BY INSTR(DEPTH_FULLNO, ',', 1, LEVEL-1) > 0) GROUP BY SUB_NO)A INNER JOIN SUB B ON A.SUB_NO = B.NO

SELECT MAX(DEPTH) DEPTH_MAX FROM (SELECT SUB FROM (SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_SAL_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT DEBTOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_INC_CHIT UNION ALL SELECT CREDITOR_NO SUB, DEAL_DATE FROM OTH_INC_CHIT) WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(DEAL_DATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate# GROUP BY SUB) A INNER JOIN SUB B ON A.SUB = B.NO

Select sum(Money) money,Listagg(name||','||money,',') Within Group(Order by money) subMoney from( SELECT sum(MONEY) money,B.Name From sal_chit A Inner Join Sub B on A.Creditor_No=B.no where 1=1 and To_char(DEAL_DATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN '201701' AND '201712' Group By B.Name) union all Select sum(Money) money,Listagg(name||','||money,',') Within Group(Order by money) subMoney from( SELECT sum(MONEY) money,B.Name From inc_chit A Inner Join Sub B on A.Debtor_No=B.no where 1=1 and To_char(DEAL_DATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN '201701' AND '201712' Group By B.Name) union all Select sum(Money) money,Listagg(name||','||money,',') Within Group(Order by money) subMoney from( SELECT sum(MONEY) money,B.Name From Oth_Inc_Chit A Inner Join Sub B on A.Debtor_No=B.no where 1=1 and To_char(DEAL_DATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN '201701' AND '201712' Group By B.Name) union all Select sum(Money) money,Listagg(name||','||money,',') Within Group(Order by money) subMoney from( SELECT sum(MONEY) money,B.Name From Oth_sal_Chit A Inner Join Sub B on A.Creditor_No=B.no where 1=1 and To_char(DEAL_DATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN '201701' AND '201712' Group By B.Name)
